biotools.summary: imzMLConverter is a tool designed to convert various mass spectrometry imaging (MSI) data formats into the open standard imzML format, enabling cross-platform data sharing and compatibility with different software and instruments.

bioschemas.name: imzMLConverter
bioschemas.summary: imzMLConverter is a tool designed to convert various mass spectrometry imaging (MSI) data formats into the open standard imzML format, enabling cross-platform data sharing and compatibility with different software and instruments.
